languages.text: {n}На лице Хейнрикса на секунду появляется изумление — которое, впрочем, быстро сменяется многозначительной усмешкой.{/n} "Что за скандальное поведение, Лорд-капитан..." {n}Он вновь накрывает ваши губы поцелуем, уже куда требовательнее прижимая вас к себе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На лице Хейнрикса на секунду появляется изумление — которое, впрочем, быстро сменяется многозначительной усмешкой.{/n} "Что за скандальное поведение, Лорд-капитан..." {n}Он вновь накрывает ваши губы поцелуем, уже куда требовательнее прижимая вас к себе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Хейнрикса на секунду появляется изумление — которое, впрочем, быстро сменяется многозначительной усмешкой.{/n} "Что за скандальное поведение, Лорд-капитан..." {n}Он вновь накрывает ваши губы поцелуем, уже куда требовательнее прижимая вас к себе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

{n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

{n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

{n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希震惊地盯着你看了一会儿，但随后就露出了充满承诺意味的笑容。{/n}“如此不合时宜的行为，舰长大人……”{n}他再次吻住了你，双手更加用力，把你搂在怀里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希震惊地盯着你看了一会儿，但随后就露出了充满承诺意味的笑容。{/n}“如此不合时宜的行为，舰长大人……”{n}他再次吻住了你，双手更加用力，把你搂在怀里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira, asombrado, durante un segundo pero pronto te lanza una sonrisa prometedora.{/n} «Menuda conducta más escandalosa, Lord Capitán...». {n}Se apodera de tu boca con un beso más, mientras sus manos, exigentes, te estrechan contra él.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira, asombrado, durante un segundo pero pronto te lanza una sonrisa prometedora.{/n} «Menuda conducta más escandalosa, Lord Capitán...». {n}Se apodera de tu boca con un beso más, mientras sus manos, exigentes, te estrechan contra él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは一瞬驚いたようにあなたを見つめたが、すぐに期待に満ちた笑みに変わった。 {/n}「そのようなスキャンダラスな行為は、ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ハインリックスはもう一度、あなたの口をキスで塞ぎ、その手であなたを抱き寄せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは一瞬驚いたようにあなたを見つめたが、すぐに期待に満ちた笑みに変わった。 {/n}「そのようなスキャンダラスな行為は、ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ハインリックスはもう一度、あなたの口をキスで塞ぎ、その手であなたを抱き寄せた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous dévisage un court instant, abasourdi, mais il ne lui faut pas longtemps pour se ressaisir et afficher un sourire grivois.{/n} « Votre conduite est tout bonnement scandaleuse, seigneure-capitaine... » {n}Il scelle de nouveau vos lèvres d'un baiser fougueux et vous attire tout contre lui, ses mains de plus en plus pressantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous dévisage un court instant, abasourdi, mais il ne lui faut pas longtemps pour se ressaisir et afficher un sourire grivois.{/n} « Votre conduite est tout bonnement scandaleuse, seigneure-capitaine... » {n}Il scelle de nouveau vos lèvres d'un baiser fougueux et vous attire tout contre lui, ses mains de plus en plus pressantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich kurz erstaunt an, grinst daraufhin aber verheißungsvoll.{/n} "Euer Verhalten ist geradezu skandalös, Lord Captain ..." {n}Erneut küsst er dich leidenschaftlich. Während er dich an sich herandrückt, geht er mit seinen Händen jetzt aber bestimmter zur Sache.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich kurz erstaunt an, grinst daraufhin aber verheißungsvoll.{/n} "Euer Verhalten ist geradezu skandalös, Lord Captain ..." {n}Erneut küsst er dich leidenschaftlich. Während er dich an sich herandrückt, geht er mit seinen Händen jetzt aber bestimmter zur Sache.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana bir anlığına afallayarak baksa da ifadesinin yerini aniden umut dolu bir sırıtış alıyor.{/n} "Ne kadar da ahlak dışı bir davranış Lord Kaptan..." {n}Seni bir kez daha öpmek için dudaklarına yapışıyor. Seni kendine çekmesiyle elleri artık daha da talepkâr bir şekilde hareket ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you in astonishment for a second, but that is immediately replaced by a smirk full of promise.{/n} "Such scandalous conduct, Lord Captain..." {n}He claims your mouth in a kiss once more, his hands more demanding now as he holds you against him.{/n}
